equipment.name: Explorer's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Rage
features.description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

equipment.name: Diplomat's Pack
equipment.description: Chest, 2 cases for maps and scrolls, fine clothes, ink, ink pen, lamp, 2 flasks of oil, paper, perfume, sealing wax, soap

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You have learned to untangle and reshape the fabric of reality in harmony with your wishes and music.

features.name: Bardic Inspiration
features.description: You can inspire others through stirring words or music. To do so, you use a bonus action on your turn to choose one creature other than yourself within 60 feet of you who can hear you.

equipment.name: Priest's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, blanket, 10 candles, tinderbox, alms box, 2 blocks of incense, censer, vestments, 2 days of rations, waterskin

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast cleric spells.

features.name: Divine Domain
features.description: Choose one domain related to your deity: Knowledge, Life, Light, Nature, Tempest, Trickery, or War.

equipment.name: Explorer's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: Drawing on the divine essence of nature itself, you can cast spells to shape that essence.

features.name: Wild Shape
features.description: Starting at 2nd level, you can use your action to magically assume the shape of a beast that you have seen before.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the fighting styles.

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

equipment.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, crowbar, hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, tinderbox, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: Beginning at 1st level, while you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

features.name: Martial Arts
features.description: At 1st level, your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons.

features.name: Divine Sense
features.description: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears.

features.name: Lay on Hands
features.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest.

equipment.name: Explorer's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Favored Enemy
features.description: Beginning at 1st level, you have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy.

features.name: Natural Explorer
features.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions.

equipment.name: Burglar's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, 1000 ball bearings, 10 feet of string, bell, 5 candles, crowbar, hammer, 10 pitons, hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days of rations, tinderbox, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Expertise
features.description: At 1st level, choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one of your skill proficiencies and your proficiency with thieves' tools.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Beginning at 1st level, you know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

features.name: Thieves' Cant
features.description: During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation.

equipment.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, crowbar, hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, tinderbox, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: An event in your past, or in the life of a parent or ancestor, left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with arcane magic.

features.name: Sorcerous Origin
features.description: Choose a sorcerous origin, which describes the source of your innate magical power.

equipment.name: Scholar's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, book of lore, ink, ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, little bag of sand, small knife

features.name: Otherworldly Patron
features.description: At 1st level, you have struck a bargain with an otherworldly being of your choice.

features.name: Pact Magic
features.description: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron have given you facility with spells.

equipment.name: Scholar's Pack
equipment.description: Backpack, book of lore, ink, ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, little bag of sand, small knife

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: As a student of arcane magic, you have a spellbook containing spells that show the first glimmerings of your true power.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: You have learned to recover some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook.
